tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She will talk nicely and listen to our problems. She will give proper guidance and explain health issues nicely .
The docter was really very friendly and co-operative for which I could share her all my problems without any hesitation. Her recommended medicines also worked well.
In a simple words she is nice and friendly with the patients. please visit her once to experience her patience and smile too..
Doctor Chandan is very nice doctor. She understands our situations & suggest accordingly. I recommend her.

too bad experience with this doctor  ****** ****** *** ** **** ** ******** ** *********  I said I don't want to join if I feel pain I will come and join she has taken a letter from me that I am not responsible for any thing happens to me she always ask to join in Gangotri hospitals last time I have listen and joined ******* **** **** ***** just took money bed charges and nursing charges today took mtp charges for explaining the treatment and consulting charges are different I don't have a option to upload the photos other wise done it be careful with this doctor
The Doctor is one of the nicest gynaecologists that my wife consulted. She is very gentle and I would definitely recommend her to others.

Excellent* *** * ** ** *********
She is very kind and very cooperative person. She has trated very well.
Expert and guidance in respect to pregnancy, diet required during this time, given proper medical support. Thanks a ton for understanding the patient.

review: She was good but we had to wait for nearly 30 minits.  Her replies to our quries are satisfactory and hospital was neat and clean.

review: We are consulting doctor from last 2 month and we are satisfied. Dr. is very kind will answer your every question no extra test, medicine other that required.
The doctor is nice..listens the problem patiently. Gave the medicine which is beneficiary for me..will recommend her.
Nice doctor.. Well understanding problems of patients.. Dealing patients very polite n good manner. Treatment is very good.
My experience with the doctor was good. She was polite and gave me sufficient time to explain my problems. Also, explained her diagnosis and prescription in detail.
Dr. Chandna is very friendly and she is gave good advice to us. I would suggest to all please visit once her clinic....
My experience was Dr. Chandana was good. She spends enough time with patient and do not take any extra charges. She is good and i recommend for girls and women to visit her.
